alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 22 at 9:18AM EST until December 22 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Tolland CT and Windham CT Counties. In Massachusetts, Northern Worcester MA, Central Middlesex MA, Southern Worcester MA and Northern Middlesex MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Northwest Providence RI County. This also includes the cities and towns of Union, Vernon, Putnam, Willimantic, Barre, Fitchburg, Framingham, Lowell, Milford, Worcester, Ayer, Foster, and Smithfield. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility, near zero at times.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester
